segments.text: Hi ! Susan ! I haven ’ t seen you for ages !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been really busy . How is everything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , fine . Hey , why don ’ t we grab a bite to eat and do some catching up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , why not ? I ’ Ve got a little free time on my hands . Where do you want to eat ?
segments.speaker: S2
